author: imikushin
title: Cardano-Cosmos IBC Bridge
description: Cardano needs interoperability with other blockchains. Bridges to large ecosystems can create billions of dollars in TVL. Data: [1].
solution: A Cardano IBC [2] bridge will bring interoperability with the rapidly expanding Cosmos [3] ecosystem and enable cross-chain applications.
experience: Experience leading teams, building software with a spectrum of technologies: imperative and functional languages, web stacks, Kubernetes.
